featured.title: Blobnest
featured.description: BlobNest is a modern, professional web dashboard for managing and monitoring your Azure Blob Storage account. It provides a user-friendly interface for administrators and users to view, organize, and control containers, files, and storage activity in real time.

featured.title: Video Downloader
featured.description: Video Downloader is a modern, professional web application for downloading and managing videos from a wide range of platforms. It provides a user-friendly interface for users to fetch, preview, and manage their downloaded videos, all stored securely in the cloud and available for download to any device.

featured.title: Audiobook AI
featured.description: A modern web application for converting text to speech and managing audiobooks.

featured.title: The Met Museum
featured.description: A modern landing page for The Met Museum.
